page.title: 20CLOTHING
page.content: Clothes are mostly things that you wear,but not all things for instance a necklace or a bracelet or a ring is not clothing.It is jewellery.An umbrella is not clothing either.You can have clothes that protect you or clothes that you just wear normally.A suit of armour is for instance clothing that protects you.Also people wear clothes for fashion and to look smart.When you go out to discos you dress up for fashion and to look smart.Clothes are made out of all different kinds of material such as cotton,nylon,wool etc.Shoes are made out of leather.For going to school you should really wear school uniform. Boys wear black trousers, a green and black tie,a grey,white or blue shirt, some socks and a green jumper. Girls wear the same tie,a jumper,a grey dress or skirt and a white blouse.
